projectSlogan: E-commerce Web Application for SZN Clothing Brand
projectDescription: A fully functional and customizable e-commerce platform designed for the SZN clothing brand. The platform features a user-friendly interface for customers to browse and purchase products. The admin side provides tools for managing inventory, orders, and customizing the home page, including carousel images and product categories. Built with scalability and performance in mind, it ensures a seamless shopping experience.

projectSlogan: Online Marketplace for School Organization's Merchandise
projectDescription: A fully functional online marketplace built specifically for the organizations at Cavite State University (CVSU) - SIlang Campus to sell their merchandise. The platform includes a user side for browsing and purchasing items and an admin side for managing products, orders, and categories. Designed to streamline the buying and selling process, it provides a reliable and efficient solution for CVSU Silang's organization officials.
